attributes.action: GUARANTEE COVID-19 TESTING, PPE and PAY KEYWORKERS A 25% BONUS (or tax-free)
attributes.additional_details:
Now we are losing NHS and transport workers, indicating that potentially, the more exposure you have to the airborne coronavirus the more ‘at risk’ you are of contracting Covid-19, particularly if you live in poor socio-economic conditions. 

Please provide tests, PPE and pay to ALL key workers because every life is important. This must not happen to others in transport, care or retail sectors.

The average key worker remuneration in 2018 was £19,000 and I think we can do better than that!
attributes.background: We have asked the lowest paid in society to take the highest risk. Each day they go to the frontline or multiple homes to keep communities safe. These people are NHS staff, first responders, care workers, concierges, shop assistants, warehouse staff etc, paid the Minimum Wage or London Living Wage.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions, calling for similar actions:

Pay bonus to all key workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307215

Provide all workers dealing with the public PPE to be protected from COVID-19:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307866

Provide publicly accessible testing for the covid-19 virus around the UK now: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301354
